featured.text: 24 the snow covering the peak, there will not be enough moisture and water to nourish the plants and animals below.
They are properly watered and nourished.
These sprouts grow slowly, nourished by the root system of the “mother” tree.

definition.zh_def: 滋養；提供營養以促進生長或健康。
definition.en_def: To provide with the food or other substances necessary for growth, health, and good condition.
definition.example: It is important to nourish your body with healthy foods.
